title: Magnolia Three - Day Weather / Sky Report : Bright ISS pass tonight
description: A crisp, dry air mass remains in place over south Arkansas Saturday, keeping daytime temperatures in the low 30s before a warming trend builds in by Monday, according to the, A crisp, dry air mass remains in place over south Arkansas Saturday, keeping daytime temperatures in the low 30s before a warming trend builds in by Monday, according to the National Weather Service.
